subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Ferrer overpowered Richard Gasquet, 6-1, 6-2, to win the Japan Open for his third title of the year. The top-seeded Ferrer was in control from the outset, breaking Gasquet in the first game of a match that lasted only 52 minutes.
snippet: David Ferrer overpowered Richard Gasquet, 6-1, 6-2, to win the Japan Open for his third title of the year. The top-seeded Ferrer was in control from the outset, breaking Gasquet in the first game of a match that lasted only 52 minutes.
